body: Gnomes experiment with all manner of mechanical devices. Gnomes with this racial trait gain a +1 bonus on Disable Device and Knowledge (engineering) checks. They are treated as proficient with any weapon they have personally crafted. This racial trait replaces defensive training and hatred.
name: Master Tinker
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Gnomes/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Master Tinker
